FuncDef:
The radius-attribute tunnel-password command sets the mode in which the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password to simple text or cipher on the device.
The undo radius-attribute tunnel-password command restores the default setting.
By default, the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password in cipher mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the mode in which the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password to cipher.
-

Sets the mode in which the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password to simple text.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device supports either of the following modes in which the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password: simple text or cipher. The mode configured on the device needs to be the same as the mode in which the RADIUS server sends a tunnel password.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
